About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a self taught web designer/developer based in Cape Town, South Africa. My passion is to use technology based solutions to help solve real world problems and I'm constantly expanding my knowledge of various tech such as HTML5/CSS3/SCSS, JavaScript and my latest addition REACT/REDUX.
